entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early this afternoon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. A few flurries beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature falling to minus 12 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Sunday 22 January 2023
